name: Orbital Defense
description:
Protect your small world from certain destruction! Pilot your ship through space and blow up the asteroids threatening your planet - but fuel is limited! Can you plan your trajectories efficiently, or will you drift helplessly and watch as your planet explodes?

I recommend playing in full screen if you play in the browser.

Created by Misha Kushnir for Ludum Dare 38

Music by Frank Tedesco

Art from Kenney on opengameart.org: https://opengameart.org/users/kenney
